title: Could You Be Driving A Car With A Recall?
teaser: General Motors has recalled more than 15 million cars this year. Alec Gutierrez of Kelley Blue Book tells NPR's Scott Simon what this means if you own a GMC, Chevrolet, Buick or Cadillac.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
